question: autumn-in-phandom. tumblr. com/post/179726738681/for-those-that-think-dans-furry-mentions-over-the opinion?:)
answer:
I saw this post in the phan tag and I was going to reblog and unpack it but I don’t even know where to begin.


I guess people really think he’s an actual furry.


And they’re allowed to think that.


Even if I think they couldn’t possibly be more wrong.

reblog.comment:

And they’re allowed to think that.


Even if I think they couldn’t possibly be more wrong.

blog.name: autumn-in-phandom

tags: copied from my post on idb
they’re both on the furry spectrum
we don’t know in what ways they express it privately
one doesn’t need to like bright cartoon fursuits and go to cons to be a furry
summary: For those that think Dan’s furry mentions over the years are just a joke (or for those who want some reassurance that they’re...
body:
For those that think Dan’s furry mentions over the years are just a joke (or for those who want some reassurance that they’re not):

It’s more than just the jokes. It’s a strong interest in animals, in their mating calls, heck just in their mating, particularly the mating of animals of the same sex. It’s feeling comfortable in and never wanting to take off a lion suit as a teenager. It’s a whole closet full of onesies (yes I know that most of them were gifted). It’s talking about the anthropomorphic tv shows and video games that shaped their childhood and the role playing that was done. It’s making foxes a part of the AmazingPhil brand, in addition to lions. Heck it’s all those animal jumpers they both own. All the stuffed animals Dan kept well past childhood and posed naked with. It’s Dan using furry as a metaphor for deflecting about the nature of his relationship with Phil in his diss track. It’s starting out a very personal, declaration of love with “awrf”. It’s dating a boy with a very strong affinity for wolves and taking him to the zoo. It’s the importance of and attachment to a furry (material) hat and pair of mittens at the beginning of their relationship. It’s dressing up as a cat and a bear on Halloween instead of something gorey. It’s Phil commenting that there better be a bear on Dan’s first YouTube banner. It’s a childhood nickname that stuck and got picked up and ‘there’s no bear on this island =<‘ It’s the fucking cat whiskers, not just in pinof but before, and Phil saying they made him feel good, and making sure Dan always brought the special marker whenever he visited Phil. It’s Phil quietly saying it’s ok to google furries after Dan says not to when they mentioned they were educating Louise about it. It’s Phil sincerely saying being a furry is a good life choice. Dan may make jokes about it but Phil is usually calm and matter of fact. You may interpret that as perhaps Phil being the furry and Dan just being vocal about it to deflect, but I think that’s just their styles. As alittledizzy said the other day, Dan is in a constant state of joking and being serious about things simultaneously. So yeah, much more than just a nine year running joke.
